title: Assisted Living JAB, Trump Comparison, Junior VS Roscoe Wallace and more.
itunes:title: Assisted Living JAB, Trump Comparison, Junior VS Roscoe Wallace and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The Earl of Ottingham is back with another episode. He talks about the upcoming election and gives us his pick. The Chief Love Officer has a woman that is bored and falls asleep during foreplay. Our very own J. Anthony Brown stars in 'Tyler Perry's Assisted Living' which premieres tonight on BET at 9/8 CST. Trump did an interview with Fox News and compared the police in Kenosha with golfers that choke. Junior and Roscoe both sing some Jodeci. Who does it better? Tennis is back with the U.S. Open. Naomi Osaka honored Breonna Taylor and she won her match. R. Kelly's attorney is offering up details about the prison attack Kells suffered last month. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve straight up said that if we want black lives to matter, we have to vote. Black lives matter when black lives count.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The Earl of Ottingham is back with another episode. He talks about the upcoming election and gives us his pick. The Chief Love Officer has a woman that is bored and falls asleep during foreplay. Our very own J. Anthony Brown stars in 'Tyler Perry's Assisted Living' which premieres tonight on BET at 9/8 CST. Trump did an interview with Fox News and compared the police in Kenosha with golfers that choke. Junior and Roscoe both sing some Jodeci. Who does it better? Tennis is back with the U.S. Open. Naomi Osaka honored Breonna Taylor and she won her match. R. Kelly's attorney is offering up details about the prison attack Kells suffered last month. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve straight up said that if we want black lives to matter, we have to vote. Black lives matter when black lives count.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
